product_name: Moving Comfort Work It Shorts - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Not a fan of short shorts? The Moving Comfort Work It Shorts feature a longer inseam than most running shorts so you stay covered and comfortable while you're putting in the miles. DriLayer(R) stretch-polyester fabric wicks moisture away from skin; liner brief also wicks moisture to keep you comfortable. Soft, wide waistband lies flat against skin; hand pockets and internal stash pocket offer easy storage. Moving Comfort Work It Shorts feature a 7 in. inseam. Closeout.
short_description: Not a fan of short shorts? The Moving Comfort Work It Shorts feature a longer inseam than most running shorts so you stay covered and comfortable while you're putting in the miles.
